// Component imports import React, { useState} from 'react'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal'; import Table from 'react-bootstrap/Table'; export default function UserPage(){ const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const editUserClose = () => setShow(false); const editUserShow = () => setShow(true); return( <>
